name: Shed Simulator
description:
"Wow, it's as if I really own a shed!"  Tend to your trees, visit family, and take in the beautiful scenery in Shed Simulator!  Contains 3 interactive endings! If you're ever lost, simply read the To-Do list on the wall, or talk to your cousin! He knows these woods like the back of his hand!

Controls:
WS = Walk
QE = Strafe
AD = Turn
Enter = Interact

Update: Leaving the cousin's house before finishing his task will no longer softlock the player. Sorry about that :D

Credit goes towards 

  • CutieVirus for the MV3D plugin, which you can find here
  • GALV's Message Sound Effects
  • RS_MessageAlign by biud436
  • RPG Maker MV
